SEARCH
Package crm.oilwhere.service

Class NewsletterService

java.lang.Object
crm.oilwhere.service.NewsletterService
@Service public class NewsletterService extends Object
Service layer for managing newsletter templates and sending emails. Provides business logic for CRUD operations on the Newsletter table and email sending functionality.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NewsletterService(NewsletterRepository newsletterRepository, org.simplejavamail.api.mailer.Mailer mailer, EmailBuilderUtil emailBuilderUtil)
    Constructs a new NewsletterService with the specified repository, mailer, and email builder utility.

  • Constructor Details

    • NewsletterService

      @Autowired public NewsletterService(NewsletterRepository newsletterRepository, org.simplejavamail.api.mailer.Mailer mailer, EmailBuilderUtil emailBuilderUtil)
      Constructs a new NewsletterService with the specified repository, mailer, and email builder utility.
      Parameters:
      newsletterRepository - the repository used to interact with the newsletter data in the database
      mailer - the mailer used to send emails
      emailBuilderUtil - the utility used to build email messages

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public List<Newsletter> getAll()
      Retrieves all newsletter templates from the database. Uses JPA repository's findAll() method.
      Returns:
      a list of all Newsletter records

    • updateTemplate

      public Newsletter updateTemplate(Long id, NewsletterDTO newsletterDTO)
      Updates an existing newsletter template with new details from the provided NewsletterDTO. Uses JPA repository's findById() and save() methods.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the newsletter to update
      newsletterDTO - the data transfer object containing updated newsletter details
      Returns:
      the updated Newsletter record
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the newsletter with the specified ID is not found

    • createNewsletter

      public Newsletter createNewsletter(NewsletterDTO newsletterDTO)
      Creates a new newsletter template in the database based on the provided NewsletterDTO. Uses JPA repository's save() method.
      Parameters:
      newsletterDTO - the data transfer object containing details of the new newsletter template
      Returns:
      the created Newsletter record

    • deleteTemplate

      public String deleteTemplate(Long id)
      Deletes a newsletter template from the database by its ID. Uses JPA repository's existsById() and deleteById() methods.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the newsletter template to delete
      Returns:
      a confirmation message if the deletion is successful
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the newsletter with the specified ID is not found

    • sendMail

      public void sendMail(String custName, String custEmail, String subject, String body)
      Sends an email to a customer with the specified details. Constructs an HTML email message using the customer's name, email, subject, and body, then sends it using the configured mailer.
      Parameters:
      custName - the name of the customer receiving the email
      custEmail - the email address of the customer
      subject - the subject of the email
      body - the HTML body content of the email
